subject: Re: i have a big problem with my rt2500 pci wireless
body:
On Tue, May 01, 2007 at 11:01:25PM +0000, javier melendez wrote:
> 
> no, I have typed top and my load over memory or cpu don't have problem. 

boot without inserting module; check all is fine, then keeping an eye on
syslog (or just run dmesg in terminal) modprobe the rt2500; check dmesg 
again; ifconfig ra0 up , check dmesg again.
See if there's any clue there.

--
paolo


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
